substep.cmd: Join the string values of 5413abcdefn with a whitespace character.
If subfield 3 is present, but does not appear first in the subfield sequence, prefix the statement with the value of subfield3.
Test the value of 3 to see whether it ends with a colon.
If no colon is present, trim punctuation and concatenate the value with a colon (:).
Else, output the value of subfield 3.
